item.title: MacBook Pro 14-inch
item.author: preminstrel@gmail.com (Hanshi Sun)
item.description: In Canada, I bought a MacBook Pro 14-inch whose chip is Apple M1 Pro, with 32 GB Memory and 1TB Storage. The impressive Built-in Liquid Retina XDR Display make it’s a pleasure to watch the screen. Moreover, the
